divs: Sighting DetailsI live in wisterwood which is about a mile from the oxford valley mall. I walked outside my house at about 9 30 with my gf and I happened to look up into the sky and saw this egg shaped aircraft. It looked a little strange so it caught my attention. It was hovering in the sky above the oxford valley mall direction. As i looked at it, it started out slow then took off. Ive never seen anything so fast in my life. It disappeared like something from a movie. I know this was a UFO because there was a plane traveling at the same time and it was no where near as fast or looked like this did. It looked like something from a movie. I was shocked because i knew what i had saw.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Fairless Hills
There were no other sightings in Fairless Hills on or around June 20th 2008
